settings.title: Ustawienia karty
settings.description: Konfiguruj globalny wygląd i zachowanie karty.

spacing.title: Odstępy
spacing.description: Kontroluj odstępy i pozycjonowanie swojej karty

fields.card_border_color_desc: The border color of the card
fields.card_border_width_desc: The thickness of the card border (in pixels)
fields.card_shadow_enabled_desc: Enable custom shadow for the card
fields.card_shadow_color_desc: The color of the card shadow
fields.card_shadow_horizontal_desc: Horizontal position of the shadow (negative = left, positive = right)
fields.card_shadow_vertical_desc: Vertical position of the shadow (negative = up, positive = down)
fields.card_shadow_spread_desc: How much the shadow expands or contracts

layout.add_row_tooltip: Dodaj nowy wiersz do swojego układu

about.desc1: Potężny modularny konstruktor kart dla Home Assistant
about.desc2: Twórz niestandardowe układy z profesjonalnym interfejsem konstruktora stron
about.desc3: Modularny system układów z logiką warunkową i profesjonalnymi narzędziami projektowymi
about.support_desc: Twoje hojne napiwki napędzają rozwój niesamowitych funkcji tej karty! Bez wsparcia użytkowników takich jak ty, ciągłe innowacje nie byłyby możliwe.

actions.title: Konfiguracja akcji
actions.description: Skonfiguruj, jak ten moduł reaguje na interakcje użytkownika. Używa natywnego systemu akcji Home Assistant dla spójnego zachowania na pulpicie.
actions.double_tap_action_desc: Akcja wykonywana przy podwójnym dotknięciu modułu
actions.tap_behavior_desc: Akcja do wykonania gdy element jest dotknięty/kliknięty.
actions.hold_behavior_desc: Akcja do wykonania gdy element jest naciśnięty i przytrzymany.
actions.double_tap_behavior_desc: Akcja do wykonania gdy element jest podwójnie dotknięty/kliknięty.
actions.haptic_feedback_desc: Provide tactile feedback when buttons are pressed on supported devices
actions.entity_more_info_desc: Select which entity to show more information for
actions.entity_toggle_desc: Select which entity to toggle on/off

icon.entity_desc: Wybierz encję, którą reprezentuje ta ikona
icon.inactive_state_desc: Wartość stanu uważana za "nieaktywną" (zostaw puste, aby użyć rzeczywistego stanu encji)
icon.active_state_desc: Wartość stanu uważana za "aktywną" (zostaw puste, aby użyć rzeczywistego stanu encji)

animation_section.desc: Skonfiguruj animacje dla stanów aktywnych i nieaktywnych
animation_section.title: Animacja ikony

icon.custom_active_name_desc: Nadpisz nazwę encji gdy aktywna (zostaw puste, aby użyć nazwy encji)
icon.custom_active_state_desc: Niestandardowy tekst gdy aktywny (zostaw puste, aby użyć rzeczywistego stanu)
icon.custom_inactive_name_desc: Nadpisz nazwę encji gdy nieaktywna (zostaw puste, aby użyć nazwy encji)
icon.custom_inactive_state_desc: Niestandardowy tekst gdy nieaktywny (zostaw puste, aby użyć rzeczywistego stanu)

template_section.desc: Użyj szablonów Jinja2 dla zaawansowanej kontroli ikon. Szablony mogą kontrolować widoczność (prawda/fałsz do pokazywania/ukrywania ikon) i dostosowywać tekst stanu. Zwróć niestandardowy tekst dla stanu aktywnego, zwróć rzeczywisty stan encji dla stanu nieaktywnego.
template_section.title: Zaawansowany tryb szablonu

content_section.title: Konfiguracja zawartości
content_section.desc: Skonfiguruj zawartość tekstową i podstawowe ustawienia tego modułu.

text.text_content_desc: Wprowadź zawartość tekstową do wyświetlenia w tym module.

icon_section.title: Konfiguracja ikony
icon_section.desc: Wybierz ikonę do wyświetlenia obok zawartości tekstowej.

text.icon_desc: Wybierz ikonę do wyświetlenia obok tekstu. Zostaw puste dla braku ikony.
text.icon_position_desc: Wybierz gdzie umieścić ikonę względem tekstu.
text.template_mode_desc: Użyj składni szablonów Home Assistant do renderowania tekstu
text.value_template_desc: Szablon do renderowania tekstu używając składni Jinja2

color_section.title: Color Configuration
color_section.desc: Configure the text and icon colors for this module.

text.text_color_desc: Choose the color for the text content.
text.icon_color_desc: Choose the color for the icon.

bar_settings.title: Ustawienia paska
bar_settings.desc: Skonfiguruj jak procent paska jest obliczany i wyświetlany.

bar.attribute_entity_desc: Wybierz encję zawierającą atrybut z wartością procentową
bar.attribute_name_desc: Wprowadź nazwę atrybutu zawierającego wartość procentową (np. "battery_level")
bar.current_entity_desc: Encja reprezentująca bieżącą/zużytą ilość (np. zużyte paliwo, zużyta bateria)
bar.total_entity_desc: Encja reprezentująca całkowitą/maksymalną ilość (np. pojemność paliwa, pojemność baterii)
bar.percentage_template_desc: Wprowadź szablon Jinja2 zwracający liczbę między 0-100 dla procentu. Przykład: {{ (states('sensor.battery_level') | float) * 100 }}

animation.desc: Animuj wypełnienie paska używając ustawień jak paski ładowania, puls, blask i więcej. Możesz wyzwalać animacje na podstawie stanu lub atrybutu encji i opcjonalnie nadpisać animację gdy spełniony jest inny warunek.

override.desc: Wybierz encję akcji i stan aby zdefiniować kiedy ta animacja powinna nadpisać regularną animację
override.entity_desc: Encja do oceny dla wyzwalacza nadpisania
override.match_value_desc: Porównanie tekstowe ze stanem lub atrybutem
override.title: Nadpisanie animacji akcji
override.type_desc: Animacja do użycia gdy warunek nadpisania jest spełniony.

animation.title: Animacja paska

trigger.desc: Wybierz encję do obserwowania i zdefiniuj wartość + animację do zastosowania gdy pasuje.
trigger.entity_desc: Encja do oceny dla wyzwalacza animacji
trigger.match_value_desc: Tekst do porównania ze stanem lub atrybutem (porównanie jest tekstowe).
trigger.title: Wyzwalacz animacji
trigger.type_desc: Wybierz czy porównać stan encji czy atrybut

animation.type_desc: Wybierz jak pasek powinien się animować gdy wyzwolony.

appearance.direction_desc: Wybierz kierunek, w którym pasek wypełnia się wraz ze wzrostem wartości.
appearance.alignment_desc: Wybierz jak wyrównać pasek gdy ma mniej niż 100% szerokości.
appearance.height_desc: Dostosuj grubość paska postępu w pikselach.
appearance.title: Wygląd paska
appearance.width_desc: Ustaw szerokość paska jako procent kontenera.

attr_config.attribute_entity_desc: Wybierz encję zawierającą atrybut z wartością procentową
attr_config.attribute_name_desc: Wprowadź nazwę atrybutu zawierającego wartość procentową (np. "battery_level")
attr_config.title: Konfiguracja atrybutu encji

colors.title: Kolory
colors.text_color_desc: Wybierz kolor tekstu wyświetlanego na pasku.

minimal.icon_enabled_desc: Pokaż ikonę na wskaźniku minimalnego paska
minimal.icon_size_auto_desc: Automatycznie skaluj ikonę z wysokością paska
minimal.use_dot_color_desc: Użyj koloru kropki dla ikony (pasuje do gradientu)
minimal.enable_toggle: Enable the toggle above to configure icon settings

diff_config.current_entity_desc: Encja reprezentująca bieżącą/zużytą ilość (np. zużyte paliwo, zużyta bateria)
diff_config.title: Konfiguracja obliczania różnicy
diff_config.total_entity_desc: Encja reprezentująca całkowitą/maksymalną ilość (np. pojemność paliwa, pojemność baterii)

entity.desc_empty: Wybierz encję dostarczającą wartość procentową (0-100). Sensory baterii są idealne dla pasków.
entity.desc_present: Encja dostarczająca wartość procentową dla paska.
entity.no_entity_warning: Nie wybrano encji - Proszę wybrać sensor z wartościami między 0-100
entity.title: Encja procentu paska

gradient.desc: Apply a color gradient to the bar fill. When enabled, choose how the gradient is displayed and customize color stops below.
gradient.title: Gradient Mode

labels.alignment_desc: Control how left and right labels are positioned.

left.desc: Configure the title and entity value shown on the left side of the bar. This is useful for displaying labels like 'Range' or 'Battery' alongside their values.
left.enable_toggle: Enable the toggle above to configure left side settings
left.template_desc: Use a template to format the displayed value. Templates use Home Assistant's Jinja2 syntax.
left.title: Left Side
left.value_template_desc: Template to format the left side value using Jinja2 syntax

limit_entity.desc: Opcjonalne: Dodaj pionową linię wskaźnika na pasku (np. limit ładowania dla baterii EV).
limit_entity.title: Encja wartości limitu (opcjonalne)

percentage.desc: Control the visibility and appearance of percentage values shown directly on the bar. These numbers provide a clear visual indicator of the current level.
percentage.text_size_desc: Adjust the size of percentage text shown on the bar.
percentage.title: Percentage Text Display

right.desc: Configure the title and entity value shown on the right side of the bar. This is ideal for complementary information like 'Time to Full' or secondary measurements.
right.enable_toggle: Enable the toggle above to configure right side settings
right.template_desc: Use a template to format the displayed value. Templates use Home Assistant's Jinja2 syntax.
right.title: Right Side
right.value_template_desc: Template to format the right side value using Jinja2 syntax

template_config.percentage_template_desc: Wprowadź szablon Jinja2 zwracający liczbę między 0-100 dla procentu. Przykład: {{ (states('sensor.battery_level') | float) * 100 }}
template_config.title: Konfiguracja szablonu

text_display.title: Wyświetlanie tekstu
text_display.desc: Kontroluj widoczność i wygląd wartości tekstowych wyświetlanych bezpośrednio na pasku. Dla trybów różnicy i szablonu możesz wybrać wyświetlanie surowych wartości encji zamiast procentów.
text_display.show_value_desc: Gdy włączone, pokazuje rzeczywistą wartość encji zamiast procentu. Przydatne do wyświetlania surowych wartości czujników jak "45 kWh" zamiast "75%".
text_display.text_size_desc: Dostosuj rozmiar tekstu wyświetlanego na pasku.

image.source_type_desc: Choose how you want to specify the image source.
image.image_url_desc: Enter the direct URL to the image you want to display.
image.upload_desc: Click to upload an image file from your device.
image.entity_desc: Select an entity that has an image (e.g., person, camera entities).
image.entity_attr_desc: Select the entity that contains the image URL in one of its attributes.
image.attribute_name_desc: Enter the attribute path that contains the image URL (dot notation supported, e.g., vehicle_data.vehicleDetails.generalDashboard).
image.width_desc: Set the width as a percentage of the container.
image.crop_fit_desc: Control how the image fits within its container.
image.border_radius_desc: Control the rounded corners of the image.

filter.blur_desc: Apply a blur effect to your image.
filter.brightness_desc: Adjust the brightness of your image.
filter.contrast_desc: Modify the contrast of your image.
filter.saturation_desc: Adjust the saturation of your image.

hover.title: Hover Effects
hover.effect_type_desc: Choose the type of hover effect.
hover.scale_amount_desc: Adjust the scale of the image on hover.
hover.opacity_desc: Change the opacity of the image on hover.
hover.blur_amount_desc: Apply a blur effect to the image on hover.
hover.brightness_amount_desc: Adjust the brightness of the image on hover.
hover.glow_intensity_desc: Choose the intensity of the glow effect on hover.
hover.translate_x_desc: Translate the image horizontally on hover.
hover.translate_y_desc: Translate the image vertically on hover.

chart_type.title: Chart Type
chart_type.desc: Select the visualization style for your data.

data_sources.title: Data Sources
data_sources.add_first_entity: Add your first entity to create a chart

graphs.attribute_desc: Use entity state or select a specific attribute to track.
graphs.add_first_entity: Add your first entity to create a chart
graphs.time_period_desc: How much historical data to show.
graphs.normalize_desc: Useful when comparing entities with different units (e.g., % vs miles)

display.chart_alignment_desc: Alignment of the chart within its container.
display.chart_width_desc: Percentage of the module's available width. Alignment controls placement.
display.info_position_desc: Position of the overlay showing name/value.
display.legend_position_desc: Where to place the legend when enabled.
display.normalize_desc: Useful when comparing entities with different units (e.g., % vs miles)
display.time_period_desc: How much historical data to show.
display.title: Display Options

data_source.title: Data Source
data_source.desc: Choose between historical data or weather forecasts

graphs.forecast_entity_desc: Select a weather entity for forecasts

forecast_attributes.title: Forecast Attributes
forecast_attributes.desc: Select which forecast values to display from the weather entity configured above. Each attribute will be shown as a separate line on the graph.

forecast_info.title: Forecast Display
forecast_info.desc: Forecasts display all available data from your weather service. The forecast type (hourly/daily) determines the time range shown.

basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.desc: Configure the button appearance and text content.

text.title: Button Text
text.desc: Text to display on the button (leave blank for icon-only).

alignment.title: Alignment
alignment.desc: How the button is aligned within its container

icon.title: Icon Settings
icon.desc: Configure icon display and positioning for the button.
icon.enable_toggle_desc: Enable the toggle above to configure icon settings

hover.effect_type_desc: Choose the hover effect for this button.
hover.title: Hover Effects
hover.enable_toggle_desc: Enable the toggle above to configure hover effects

actions.type_desc: Choose what happens when the button is clicked
actions.entity_desc: Select the entity to interact with
actions.service_data_desc: Optional data to pass to the service (JSON format)

tap.title: Akcja dotknięcia
tap.desc: Action to perform when button is tapped

hold.title: Akcja przytrzymania
hold.desc: Action to perform when button is held down

double.title: Akcja podwójnego dotknięcia
double.desc: Action to perform when button is double-tapped

button.show_icon_desc: Display an icon on the button
button.icon_position_desc: Position of the icon relative to text

info.show_icon_desc: Display an icon next to the entity value
info.show_name_desc: Display the entity name above the value
info.custom_name_desc: Override the entity name with a custom name
info.show_units_desc: Display the unit of measurement (if available)

template.title: Tryb szablonu
template.desc: Use a template to format the entity value. Templates allow you to use Home Assistant templating syntax for complex formatting.
template.mode_desc: Use Home Assistant templating syntax to format the value
template.value_desc: Template to format the entity value using Jinja2 syntax

info.icon_size_desc: Size of the icon in pixels
info.name_size_desc: Size of the entity name text in pixels
info.value_size_desc: Size of the entity value text in pixels
info.icon_gap_desc: Space between the icon and content in pixels

config.title: Camera Configuration
config.desc: Configure the camera entity and display settings.

camera.entity_desc: Select the camera entity to display. This should be a camera or mjpeg entity from Home Assistant.
camera.name: Camera Name
camera.name_desc: Custom name for the camera. Leave empty to use entity name.
camera.show_name_desc: Display the camera name on the feed

name_position.title: Name Position
name_position.desc: Choose where the camera name appears as an overlay on the camera image.

live_view.title: Live View
live_view.desc: Enable to show live camera stream (requires stream integration). When disabled, shows still image snapshots.

auto_refresh.title: Auto Refresh
auto_refresh.desc: Automatically refresh the camera image at regular intervals

refresh_interval.title: Refresh Interval (seconds)
refresh_interval.desc: How often to refresh the camera image automatically.

camera.width_desc: Set the width of the camera display. Range: 100-1000px
camera.height_desc: Set the height of the camera display. Range: 100-1000px

aspect_linked.title: Aspect Ratio Linked
aspect_linked.desc: Dimensions maintain {ratio}:1 ratio. Adjusting one dimension automatically updates the other to maintain proportions.

aspect_independent.title: Independent Dimensions
aspect_independent.desc: Width and height can be adjusted independently. Click the link button above to maintain aspect ratio.

crop.title: Crop & Position
crop.desc: Adjust the crop and position of the camera view. Useful for focusing on specific areas or removing unwanted edges.
crop.left_desc: Crop from the left edge. Higher values show less of the left side.
crop.right_desc: Crop from the right edge. Higher values show less of the right side.
crop.top_desc: Crop from the top edge. Higher values show less of the top area.
crop.bottom_desc: Crop from the bottom edge. Higher values show less of the bottom area.

template.title: Tryb szablonu
template.desc: Use a template to dynamically set the camera entity. Templates allow you to use Home Assistant templating syntax for conditional camera selection.
template.mode_desc: Use Home Assistant templating syntax to dynamically select camera entity
template.camera_template_desc: Template to dynamically set the camera entity using Jinja2 syntax
template.example1_desc: Show camera when weather is sunny
template.example2_desc: Switch between cameras based on input boolean
template.example3_desc: Use input select to choose camera entity

show_name_toggle.enable_toggle_desc: Enable the toggle above to configure camera name display

style.title: Separator Style
style.desc: Choose the visual style of the separator line.

separator.width_desc: Width of the separator as percentage of container.
separator.show_title_desc: Add text in the middle of the separator line (e.g., ------ Text ------)

text_content.title: Zawartość tekstowa
text_content.desc: Text to display in the middle of the separator.

separator.font_size_desc: Size of the text in pixels.

text_format.title: Text Formatting
text_format.desc: Apply formatting styles to the separator text.

separator.height_desc: Controls the visual gap for Blank Space.

show_title_toggle.enable_toggle_desc: Enable the toggle above to configure title settings

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.desc: Choose whether the separator runs horizontally or vertically.

layout_extra.module_name_placeholder: Nadaj temu modułowi niestandardową nazwę, aby łatwiej go identyfikować w edytorze.
layout_extra.module_name_help: Nadaj temu modułowi niestandardową nazwę, aby łatwiej go identyfikować w edytorze.

layout_logic.display_desc: Control when this element is shown. Choose "Always" to keep it visible. Select "If EVERY condition below is met" or "If ANY condition below is met" to display it only when the conditions you add below evaluate to true.
layout_logic.every: If EVERY condition below is met
layout_logic.any: If ANY condition below is met
layout_logic.no_conditions: No conditions added yet. Click "Add Condition" to get started.
layout_logic.custom_name_desc: Optional: Give this condition a custom name for easier identification

hover_effects.title: Efekty hover
hover_effects.description: Skonfiguruj efekty wizualne, które pojawiają się po najechaniu kursorem na ten moduł, wiersz lub kolumnę.
hover_effects.effect_desc: Wybierz efekt wizualny do zastosowania podczas najechania kursorem

design.copy_tooltip: Copy current design settings (works across all Ultra Cards)
design.paste_tooltip_has: Paste copied design settings (from cross-card clipboard)
design.paste_tooltip_none: No design settings in cross-card clipboard
design.reset_all_tooltip: Reset all design settings to default
design.lock_sides: Lock to edit all sides together
design.google_fonts_warning: Google Fonts load dynamically from Google's CDN and require an internet connection. They will not be available on local/offline installations.

alignment.horizontal_desc: Choose how elements are aligned horizontally within the container.
alignment.vertical_desc: Choose how elements are aligned vertically within the container.

empty.add_modules: Add modules in the layout builder to see them here

gap.desc: Set the spacing between horizontal elements (in rem units). Use negative values to overlap elements.
gap.title: Gap Configuration

layout.desc: Configure how elements are arranged horizontally within the container.
layout.title: Layout Configuration

wrapping.desc: Allow elements to wrap to the next line when they exceed the container width.
wrapping.title: Allow Wrapping

content.desc: Enter your markdown content with full formatting support
content.label: Content
content.title: Markdown Content

markdown.enable_html_desc: Allow HTML tags in markdown content

alignment.vertical_desc: Choose how elements are aligned vertically within the container.

empty.add_modules: Add modules in the layout builder to see them here

gap.desc: Set the spacing between vertical elements (in rem units). Use negative values to overlap elements.
gap.title: Gap Configuration

layout.desc: Configure how elements are arranged vertically within the container.
layout.title: Layout Configuration

basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.desc: Configure the dropdown appearance and behavior.

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.desc: Text shown when no option is selected.

allow_empty.title: Allow Empty Selection
allow_empty.desc: Allow users to deselect all options.

default_value.title: Default Value
default_value.desc: Option value to select by default (leave empty for none).

label_settings.title: Label Settings
label_settings.disabled: Enable the toggle above to configure label settings

label_position.title: Label Position
label_position.desc: Where to position the label relative to the dropdown

icon_settings.title: Icon Settings
icon_settings.disabled: Enable the toggle above to configure icon settings

option.label: Label
option.icon_desc: Optional icon for this option (e.g., mdi:lightbulb)
option.action_type_desc: What happens when this option is selected
option.service_data_desc: Optional data to pass to the service (JSON format)
option.entity_action_desc: Action to perform on the entity
option.custom_service_data_desc: Data to pass to the custom service (JSON format)
option.disabled_desc: Disable this option (greyed out, not selectable)
option.action_desc: What happens when this option is selected
option.is_default_desc: Make this the default selected option (shows at top, disables placeholder)
option.use_state_color_desc: Use the entity state color for the icon (overrides custom color)
option.state_color_enabled: Icon will use entity state color automatically
option.more_info_entity_desc: Entity to show more information for

styling.title: Styling
styling.desc: Customize the visual appearance of the dropdown.

template_mode.title: Template Mode
template_mode.enable_desc: Use Home Assistant templating syntax to dynamically set dropdown options
template_mode.template_desc: Template to generate dropdown options using Jinja2 syntax
template_mode.disabled: Enable template mode to use dynamic content

label_icon.title: Label Icon
label_icon.disabled: Enable the toggle above to configure label icon

state_tracking.title: Current State Display
state_tracking.disabled: Enable to show current entity state as selected option

state_entity.title: State Entity
state_entity.desc: Entity to monitor for current state (e.g., input_select.scene_selector)

track_state.title: Track Selection State
track_state.desc: Remember and display the last selected option (recommended for scene selectors)

keep_selection_state.title: Keep Selection State
keep_selection_state.desc: Remember and display the last selected option (recommended for scene selectors)

favorite_colors.title: Favorite Colors
favorite_colors.description: Manage your favorite colors that appear in all Ultra Card color pickers. These colors sync across all your Ultra Cards.

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.description: Configure how your card responds to user interactions

cloud_sync.title: Cloud Sync
cloud_sync.description: Sync your favorites, colors, and reviews across all your devices using your ultracard.io account.
cloud_sync.auto_sync_desc: Automatically sync changes in the background

entity.title: Entity Configuration
entity.desc: Optional: Link to a Home Assistant entity for synced values (e.g., input_number, climate temperature).

spinbox.entity_field_desc: Select an entity to sync the spinbox value (optional). Supports input_number, number, climate entities.
spinbox.step_desc: How much the value changes with each button press
spinbox.value_desc: The initial value (only used when no entity is linked)
spinbox.value_position_desc: Where to display the value relative to buttons
spinbox.increment_icon_desc: Icon for the increment button (e.g., mdi:plus, mdi:chevron-up)
spinbox.decrement_icon_desc: Icon for the decrement button (e.g., mdi:minus, mdi:chevron-down)
spinbox.value_font_size_desc: Font size for the value display (in pixels)
spinbox.template_mode_desc: Use Jinja2 templates to dynamically compute the displayed value
spinbox.template_disabled: Enable template mode to use dynamic values
spinbox.button_size_desc: Size of the buttons in pixels (width and height)
spinbox.button_spacing_desc: Space between buttons and value display in pixels
spinbox.button_gap_desc: Space between increment and decrement buttons in pixels

cloud_backup.title: Cloud Backup
cloud_backup.description: Automatically backup your card configuration to the cloud. Never lose your work again!

sync_notification.title: Newer Backup Available
sync_notification.description: A newer backup was found from another device

ultra_card_pro.title: Ultra Card Pro
ultra_card_pro.free_banner_subtitle: Professional card management and cloud backups
ultra_card_pro.pro_banner_subtitle: Thank you for being a Pro member!
ultra_card_pro.card_name_desc: Give this card a name to identify it in your backups
ultra_card_pro.manual_backup_desc: Create a manual backup that will be stored alongside backups from all your other Ultra Cards (max 30 total)
ultra_card_pro.upgrade_subtitle: Get export, import, and manual backups for all your cards

sync_notification.title: Newer Backup Available
sync_notification.description: A newer backup was found from another device

external_card.title: 3rd Party Card
external_card.description: Embed any custom Home Assistant card into Ultra Card. The card will have full Logic and Design support.
external_card.select_card_desc: Choose which custom card to embed. Only cards installed in your Home Assistant are shown.
external_card.no_cards_desc: Install custom cards via HACS or manually to use this feature.
external_card.configure_desc: Configure the card using its native editor.
external_card.yaml_help: Enter card configuration in JSON format. Refer to the card's documentation for available options.
external_card.note: Note: Actions are not supported for 3rd party cards. Use the card's native tap/hold/double-tap actions in its configuration.
external_card.select_card_prompt: Select a 3rd party card to display
external_card.category_desc: Embed any custom Home Assistant card into Ultra Card with full Logic and Design support
external_card.upgrade_required: Upgrade to Pro to embed 3rd party cards
external_card.login_required: Login with Pro account to embed 3rd party cards

video_bg.title: Video Background (Pro)
video_bg.description: Add dynamic, conditional video backgrounds to your dashboard view
video_bg.enable_desc: Turn the video background on or off
video_bg.editor_only_desc: If enabled, the background will only be visible when NOT in edit mode
video_bg.controller_id_desc: Optional: Assign a unique ID for advanced multi-instance control
video_bg.source_type_desc: Choose the type of video source
video_bg.video_url_desc: Enter the video URL or ID
video_bg.youtube_url_desc: Enter YouTube video URL or video ID
video_bg.vimeo_url_desc: Enter Vimeo video URL or video ID
video_bg.loop_desc: Automatically restart the video when it ends
video_bg.start_time_desc: Start playback from this time offset
video_bg.opacity_desc: Control the overall transparency of the video background
video_bg.blur_desc: Apply a blur effect to the video background
video_bg.brightness_desc: Adjust the brightness of the video background
video_bg.pause_when_hidden_desc: Automatically pause video when the tab is hidden to save resources
video_bg.respect_reduced_motion_desc: Disable video playback for users who prefer reduced motion
video_bg.global_transparency_desc: Apply consistent transparency to all Ultra Cards in this view
video_bg.global_transparency_enable_desc: Apply transparency effects to all Ultra Cards in the view
video_bg.card_opacity_desc: Control the transparency of all Ultra Cards
video_bg.card_blur_desc: Apply backdrop blur to all Ultra Cards
video_bg.card_color_desc: Optional: Add a color tint to all cards
video_bg.exclusions_desc: Card IDs or CSS selectors to exclude from transparency (comma-separated)
video_bg.pro_required_desc: Video Background is a Pro feature. Install and authenticate with the Ultra Card Pro Cloud integration to unlock this module
video_bg.preview_note: Video preview placeholder - actual background will render in dashboard view
video_bg.info_note: This module controls the video background for the entire view. It will not display as a visible card in the dashboard. Only the topmost enabled module with passing logic conditions will render.
video_bg.transparency_info: Applies consistent transparency to all Ultra Cards in this view for improved readability against video backgrounds. When disabled, cards follow their native styling.
video_bg.enable_on_mobile_desc: Enable video backgrounds on mobile devices (may impact performance)
video_bg.scale_desc: Adjust the size of the video background. Use this to crop or zoom videos with different aspect ratios

provider.title: Map Provider
provider.desc: Choose between OpenStreetMap (free) or Google Maps
provider.select_desc: OpenStreetMap is free and requires no API key. Google Maps offers more features.

type.title: Map Type
type.select_desc: Choose the visual style for the map

zoom.title: Zoom Settings
zoom.desc: Control map zoom level and auto-fit behavior
zoom.level_desc: Manual zoom level (1-20). Lower values show more area.
zoom.auto_desc: Automatically calculate zoom to show all entity markers. Overrides manual zoom setting.

controls.title: Map Controls
controls.show_desc: Display zoom, pan, and other map controls
controls.disable_scroll: Disable Zoom on Mouse Wheel Scroll
controls.disable_scroll_desc: Prevent accidental zooming when scrolling the page
controls.disable_drag_desc: Prevent map panning on mobile/touch devices

dimensions.title: Map Dimensions
dimensions.desc: Control map size and aspect ratio
dimensions.aspect_ratio_desc: Choose preset aspect ratio or use custom height

markers.title: Map Markers
markers.desc: Add custom markers or track entities with location data
markers.empty_desc: Click "Add Marker" to create your first map marker

marker.name: Marker Name
marker.entity_desc: Select a device_tracker, person, or any entity with location data
marker.custom_image_desc: Upload an image or enter an image URL
marker.use_entity_picture_desc: Use the entity_picture attribute from the tracked entity
marker.icon_optional: Optional - Leave empty for solid color teardrop

style.title: Map Style
style.desc: Choose the visual style of the map tiles
style.select_desc: Select the map tile style. All styles are free to use.

map.google_api_key_desc: Enter your Google Maps API key for full JavaScript API features. Without a key, basic tile layers are used (limited features).
map.how_to_get_api_key: How to get a Google Maps API Key →

trigger.section_desc: Configure how the popup is triggered to open
trigger.type_desc: Choose how the popup will be opened
trigger.button_text_desc: Text to display on the trigger button
trigger.button_icon_desc: Icon to display on the trigger button
trigger.image_url_desc: URL of the image to use as the trigger
trigger.icon_desc: Icon to display as the trigger
trigger.button_full_width_desc: Make the button span the full width of the container
trigger.image_full_width_desc: Make the image span the full width of the container
trigger.alignment_desc: Choose how the trigger element is aligned
trigger.alignment_help: Align the trigger element to the left, center, or right
trigger.image_type_desc: Choose how to provide the image for the trigger

title.section_desc: Configure whether to show a title bar in the popup
title.show_desc: Display a title bar at the top of the popup
title.mode_desc: Choose whether to use custom text or entity state as title
title.text_desc: Enter the custom text to display in the popup title
title.entity_desc: Select an entity whose state will be used as the title
title.show_entity_name_desc: Display the entity friendly name before the state value

layout.section_desc: Configure how the popup is displayed on screen
layout.type_desc: Choose the layout style for the popup

animation.type_desc: Choose the animation style when the popup opens

close_button.section_desc: Configure the close button position and behavior
close_button.position_desc: Choose where the close button appears

state.section_desc: Configure whether this popup starts open or closed when the card loads
state.default_open_desc: When enabled, the popup will be open when the card initially loads

trigger_logic.section_desc: Control when this popup automatically opens based on conditions
trigger_logic.mode_desc: Choose how the popup state is controlled
trigger_logic.mode_every: Open if EVERY condition is met
trigger_logic.mode_any: Open if ANY condition is met
trigger_logic.auto_close_desc: Automatically close popup when conditions become false
trigger_logic.no_conditions: No conditions added yet. Click "Add Condition" to get started.
trigger_logic.always_note: Popup will always remain open. Users can still manually close it, but it will reopen automatically.
trigger_logic.manual_note: Popup state is controlled manually by user interaction. Set Default State above to choose initial state.
trigger_logic.custom_name_desc: Optional: Give this condition a custom name
trigger_logic.template_desc: Jinja2 template that should evaluate to true/false to open the popup
trigger_logic.note_message: These trigger conditions control when the popup opens. This is different from the Logic tab, which controls whether this module is visible on the card.
trigger_logic.helper_tip: To open a popup based on a helper, add an "Entity State" condition, select your helper entity, set operator to "=", and enter "on" as the value.

design.trigger_button_desc: Customize the appearance of the trigger button
design.title: Title Styling
design.title_desc: Customize the appearance of the popup title bar
design.content_desc: Customize the appearance of the popup content area
design.overlay_desc: Customize the backdrop behind the popup
design.close_button_desc: Customize the appearance of the close button
design.close_button_size_desc: Size of the close button icon (in pixels)
design.close_button_icon_desc: Icon to display on the close button

preview.no_modules: No modules added. Add modules to this popup in the Layout tab.

auto_close_timer.section_desc: Configure automatic popup closing after a specified time
auto_close_timer.enabled_desc: Automatically close the popup after a specified time
auto_close_timer.seconds_desc: Number of seconds before the popup automatically closes

edit_page_notice.title: Preview Only
edit_page_notice.message: This popup module will not appear on your dashboard, only in your edit screen. Popups triggered by logic conditions, page load, or auto-close timers are disabled during editing.

edit_overlay.message: Edit this module to see preview

orientation.title: Tab Orientation
orientation.desc: Choose how the tabs are arranged.

style.title: Tab Style
style.desc: Choose the visual style for the tabs.

alignment.title: Tab Alignment
alignment.desc: Choose how tabs are aligned within their container.

behavior.switch_on_hover_desc: Switch tabs when hovering over them instead of clicking.

sections.title: Sections
sections.desc: Manage your tab sections. Drag to reorder, click to edit titles.

typography.title: Typography
typography.desc: Configure the font settings for tab labels.

design.active_desc: Customize the appearance of the currently selected tab.
design.inactive_desc: Customize the appearance of tabs that are not selected.
design.hover_desc: Customize the appearance when hovering over inactive tabs.
design.tab_padding_desc: Padding inside each tab (CSS value, e.g. "10px 16px").
design.tab_border_radius_desc: Border radius for tabs (CSS value, e.g. "8px" or "50%").
design.content_desc: Customize the appearance of the content area below/beside the tabs.
design.content_padding_desc: Padding around the content area (CSS value).
design.content_border_radius_desc: Border radius for content area (CSS value).
design.content_border_width_desc: Border width for content area (in pixels).
design.transition_duration_desc: How long tab transitions take (CSS value, e.g. "0.2s").

preview.no_sections_desc: Add sections in the General tab to get started.
preview.no_modules: No modules added. Add modules to this section in the Layout tab.
